references.reason: This paper introduces constrained policy optimization, a technique crucial for the safe and reliable application of reinforcement learning, which is directly relevant to the concepts of this research.

references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: This foundational paper in meta-learning introduces the model-agnostic meta-learning (MAML) algorithm, which is a key benchmark and a central point of comparison for the proposed algorithm in this research.

references.paper_title: Bilevel programming for hyperparameter optimization and meta-learning
references.reason: This paper connects the proposed bilevel optimization framework to the broader field of bilevel programming, providing a theoretical basis and algorithm design insights.

references.paper_title: Learning-to-learn stochastic gradient descent with biased regularization
references.reason: This paper is essential because it provides theoretical insights into optimization-based meta-learning, including convergence guarantees and optimality analyses, which are relevant to the theoretical contributions of this work.

references.paper_title: On the global optimality of model-agnostic meta-learning
references.reason: This paper is critical because it directly addresses the theoretical optimality of meta-learning algorithms, providing a critical comparative analysis for the theoretical results presented in this paper.
